devo_ml.modelmanager.client_factory

create_client_from_token(url: str, token: str, auth_type: Optional[str] = None, download_path: Optional[str] = None, **kwargs) → Client[source]

Creates an ML Model Manager Client with token authentication.

Parameters

  • url (str) – The URL of the server

  • token (str) – The token to authenticate.

  • auth_type (str, optional) – The type of authentication to use with the token, STANDALONE or BEARER. get_default_auth_type is used if is not provided.

  • download_path (str, optional) – The path where model files will be downloaded. The current directory . is used if not provided.

  • kwargs – Additional options for underlying request, e.g. timeout. These options are the same of the requests library can manage.

Returns

A ready to use Client object.

Return type

Client

create_client_from_profile(profile: str, path: Optional[str] = None, **kwargs) → Client[source]

Creates an ML Model Manager Client from a profile located in a file.

The profile has this shape:

{
    "url": <url_api>,
    "token": <token_to_authenticate>,
    "auth_type": <STANDALONE | BEARER>
    "download_path": <path_to_download_models>
}
Parameters

  • profile (str) – The name of the profile to use.

  • path (str, optional) – The path, file path or filename to search for a profile.

  • kwargs – Additional options for underlying request, e.g. timeout. These options are the same of the requests library can manage.

Returns

A ready to use Client object.

Return type

Client
